description: Primes that are congruent to -1 mod n, where n is the index of the prime.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..53
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = forprime(p=2, nn, if (Mod(p,primepi(p)) + 1 == 0, print1(p, ", "))) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 09 2015(PARI) list(lim)=my(v=List(), n, t); forprime(p=2, lim, t=(p+1)/n++; if(denominator(t)==1, listput(v, p))); Vec(v) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 18 2016
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1999
